title: My Snowdown Shop
body:
This is what i got in my Snowdown Shop"
Blade Queen Lissandra -30% 945 (i really wanted another liss skin, this pleases me)
Snowday Malzahar        -60% 390 (the skin that a lot of pros use)
Warmonger Sion           -40% 585  (i prefer Mecha Zero but this is nice)
Urf Tahm Kench             -50% 375  (Im not that interested in playing with tahm but this might make me more interested)
Bloodmoon Jhin            -50% 675  (this is the second time i got a jhin skin for halp price. Jhin is the only ADC i can stand playing)
finally a Soraka skin      -605 390  (I like supp as soraka but i havent played her lately)

Im yet to by any of these skins (the total price to spend is 3360) but i will buy these skins eventually.

Overal, i like what i got from Snowdown shop. GJ RIOT.

replies.body:
Shadow Evelynn - 70% off - 156rp
Commando J4 - 70% off - 156rp
Hextech Galio - 40% off - 312rp
Buccaneer Tristana - 60% off -208rp
Jurassic Cho'Gath - 50% off - 487rp
Definitely not Blitzcrank - 30% off - 364rp

Master Arcanist Ziggs - 70% off
Frozen Terror Noc - 50% off
Arcade Sona - 30% off
Celestine Soraka - 20% off
Void Bringer Illaoi - 60% off
Blood Moon Thresh - 40% off

Not a bad pull, but i'm poor as shit, so this shop (based on Murphy's Law) will be the only time i get any decent skins...
